com.heliosmind.modulehandler

Class Initializer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.heliosmind.modulehandler.Initializer

  • public class Initializer
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages the dynamic initialization of modules in a program, as well as their dependencies.
    Author:
    Samuel Beausoleil

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static java.util.Set<FileHandler> fileHandlers
      Contains the registered file handlers to read and parse the ModuleMetadata in file form.
      private static java.util.Set<AbstractModule> loadedModules
      This set contains the name of all the classes linked to initialization that have already been loaded.

      • loadModules

        public static void loadModules(java.io.File dir,
                               java.lang.Object... providedObjects)
                        throws InitializationException
        Loads all of the modules in a directory. Note that this is not recursive.
        Parameters:
        dir - The directory containing all of the modules.
        Throws:
        DependencyException
        InitializationException

      • checkMissingDependencies

        private static java.lang.String[] checkMissingDependencies(ModuleMetadata meta,
                                                           java.util.LinkedList<ModuleMetadata> metadatas)
        Lists all of the missing dependencies of module.
        Parameters:
        meta - the module
        metadatas - the list of all other available modules
        Returns:
        an array with the name of all the dependencies that could not be found. Returns an empty array if no dependencies are missing.

      • canLoad

        private static boolean canLoad(ModuleMetadata meta)
        Checks if a module is ready to be loaded. Checks if all of the dependencies of the module are already loaded.
        Parameters:
        meta - the module
        Returns:
        true if all of the dependencies of that module are loaded.

      • loadModule

        private static void loadModule(ModuleMetadata meta,
                               java.lang.Object... providedObjects)
                        throws java.lang.InstantiationException,
                               java.lang.IllegalAccessException,
                               java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        Loads a module.
        Parameters:
        meta - the metadata of that module
        providedObjects - the objects to provide to the module for it's initialization
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        java.lang.IllegalAccessException
        java.lang.InstantiationException

      • find

        private static ModuleMetadata find(java.lang.String moduleName,
                                   java.util.LinkedList<ModuleMetadata> modules)
        Finds a module's metadata from it's name inside of a list of modules' metadatas.
        Parameters:
        moduleName - the name of the module
        modules - the list of modules' metadas
        Returns:
        the metadata appropriate to that module.

      • getMetadata

        private static java.util.LinkedList<ModuleMetadata> getMetadata(java.io.File dir,
                                                                InitializationException report)
        Gets all of the metadas in a directory.
        Parameters:
        dir - the directory containing the metadata
        report - the exceptions report into witch to store the possible exceptions.
        Returns:
        a list of ModuleMetadata.
